scripts.deps: bun install --no-save ajv@8.17.1 bole@5.0.3 commander@13.1.0 debug@1.0.5 http-errors@2.0.0 immer@10.1.1 lodash@4.17.21 lru-cache@6.0.0 postgres@3.3.4 qs@6.8.0 queueable@5.3.2 restana@4.9.9 tiny-json-body-parser@1.0.2 @arrows/multimethod@2.1.0
scripts.release: rm -rf dist node_modules && bun run deps && bun run build
